name: OsteogenesisImperfecta
title: Osteogenesis Imperfecta
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of osteogenesis imperfecta.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with diagnosis codes for osteogenesis imperfecta disease classifications 1-4. Includes only relevant concepts associated with diagnoses in perinatal population. This is a grouping of ICD-9-CM, ICD-10-CM and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes diagnosis of osteoporosis with pseudoglioma.)

concept.display: Osteogenesis imperfecta, recessive perinatal lethal, with microcephaly AND cataracts (disorder)
Osteogenesis imperfecta with blue sclerae AND dentinogenesis imperfecta (disorder)
Osteogenesis imperfecta with blue sclerae AND normal teeth (disorder)
